title: Challenges and rebirth
creator_credit: Lin Yung, Jao Ming, Weng Jeng-Yih and Kwang Hwa Mass Communications
brief_description: Documents the achievements of the Taiwanese people since the establishment of the Republic of China in 1949. The transition was difficult, but through hard work and dedication, Taiwan made its mark on the world marketplace. In the 21st Century, the Taiwanese are dedicated to further developing their “laissez-faire’ economy and democratic reforms.
